TEXT.TITLE: VALLEY RESOURCES <VR> SETS SPLIT, RAISES PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Valley Resources Inc said its board declared a three-for-two stock split and raised the quarterly dividend to 42 cts per share presplit from 38 cts, both payable April 15, record March 31. Reuter
